name: Novofermgaragedoor
0:
”Alexa, open my garage.”
”Alexa, close my garage.”
”Alexa, is my garage door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill enables you to control your Novoferm garage door via Amazon Alexa. This makes it possible to open and close the garage door or to query the current status of the door. Please make sure that you have correctly connected the Novoferm Garagedoor WiFi Module to your garage door motor before installing the Alexa Skill. The username and password used during the installation process of the Novoferm Garagedoor WiFi Module are also required to activate the Alexa skill, so please have this information ready.
